front.title: IPv6 RA Option for SIP Proxy Server

abstract.t: This document specifies a new optional extension to IPv6 Router Advertisement messages to allow IPv6 routers to advertise SIP Proxy Server addresses to IPv6 hosts. The provisioning of the SIP Proxy Server address is crucial to access SIP-based services. Means to ensure reliable delivery of this information to connecting SIP User Agents is a must.
